channel.title: Zensical on No Sense
channel.description: Recent content in Zensical on No Sense

item.title: Convert To Zensical
item.description:
My main GitHub Page maroph/maroph.github.io is created with the MkDocs based Material for MkDocs framework.

Today I have pushed my first Zensical based version. In a first step I used the original mkdocs.yml config file without any problems. Now I have converted all the config data to the TOML format, used in the Zensical config file zensical.toml.

The only missing thing in creating my site is the functionality of the Material privacy plugin.
